title: Shout Out To Barbara
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, it’s the Dustin Ross takeover! Inspired by the recent release of The Clark Sister’s movie, we discuss family, religion and the moral compass.

Black Business of the Week - Online Beauty Supply https://www.lovleebeautysupplies.com

Wellness Segment - Black Chefs + recipes

Food Heaven Made Easy (blog) https://foodheavenmadeeasy.com

Fit Men Cook (blog) https://fitmencook.com

Rachel Ama (youtube) https://www.youtube.com/rachelama

Tabitha Brown (tiktok) https://www.tiktok.com/@iamtabithabrown

Marley Mauvais (Instagram) https://www.instagram.com/wakeupwithmarley

Bonus mentions: https://greatist.com + https://www.wellandgood.com

Thank you to our Sponsors:

Daily Harvest - Daily Harvest makes it easy to eat more fruits and vegetables with thoughtfully sourced, chef-crafted foods that can be prepared in five minutes or less. Choose from more than 65 different options like, smoothies, hearty soups, harvest bowls, and overnight oats. Go to https://www.daily-harvest.com and enter promo code FRIENDZONE to get twenty-five dollars off your first box.

Black AF - Support for today's show comes from Black AF, a new comedy series from Kenya Barris streaming April 17th, only on Netflix”. Join creator and star Kenya Barris, and Rashida Jones from The Office in this mockumentary style comedy that's bound to reboot the 'family sitcom' in a way we've never seen before. Don't forget to check out the unapologetic new comedy series Black AF on Netflix April 17th.

Follow us online:

Twitter - https://twitter.com/friendzonepod

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast

Have a GREAT day!
